params.nftId: Token ID of the RWA NFT

depositAndBorrow(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Deposit NFT and borrow in one transaction

isAutoRepayEnabled(address).notice: Check if user has auto-repay enabled

isNFTLocked(uint256).notice: Check if an NFT is locked as collateral
